sage.renderer

Class AbstractRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.renderer.AbstractRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRenderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JOGLRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRenderer
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete Renderers are derived. It provides functions common to all renderers, deferring the implementation of most IRenderer methods to concrete subclasses.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface sage.renderer.IRenderer

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractRenderer

        protected AbstractRenderer()
        A protected constructor which can only be called from subclasses. This constructor must be called by subclasses to initialize the concrete renderer implementation-independent data structures shared by all Renderers.

    • Method Detail

      • getRenderContext

        public RenderContext getRenderContext()
        Returns the RenderContext associated with an instance of a concrete implementation (subclass) of an AbstractRenderer.
        Returns:
        - the current RenderContext

      • setRenderContext

        public void setRenderContext(RenderContext newContext)
        Assigns a new RenderContext to this Renderer.
        Parameters:
        newContext - - the new RenderContext for the renderer

      • initDefaultRenderStates

        protected void initDefaultRenderStates()
        Creates a default RenderState object for each of the types of RenderStates defined in RenderState.RenderStateType. Each created RenderState object is initially set to enabled. This method should be called from the init() method of each concrete Renderer implementation once the underlying graphics context has been realized in the implementation. (This method invokes IRenderer.createRenderState(RenderState.RenderStateType) in the IRenderer implementation; the underlying implementation must be fully realized before invoking this method.)

      • getDefaultRenderState

        public RenderState getDefaultRenderState(RenderState.RenderStateType renderStateType)
        Returns the default RenderState for the specified RenderState.RenderStateType.
        Specified by:
        getDefaultRenderState in interface IRenderer
        Parameters:
        renderStateType - - the type for which the default RenderState object is being requested
        Returns:
        - the Renderer's default RenderState object for the specified type
